name: Change Control SOP Working Session Internal Input Summary

origin.filename: Change Control SOP Working Session Internal Input Summary.docx

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Objective & Scope of This SOP
texts.text: Objective & Scope of This SOP

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Purpose:
texts.text: Purpose:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: To standardize how project-impacting changes (timelines, scope, deliverables, or budget) are submitted, reviewed, approved, and tracked across cross-functional teams.
texts.text: To standardize how project-impacting changes (timelines, scope, deliverables, or budget) are submitted, reviewed, approved, and tracked across cross-functional teams.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Scope:
texts.text: Scope:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Applies to all nonclinical R&D, tech ops, QA, manufacturing, and program management projects that involve internal milestones, CRO vendors, or client deliverables.
texts.text: Applies to all nonclinical R&D, tech ops, QA, manufacturing, and program management projects that involve internal milestones, CRO vendors, or client deliverables.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Note: You may include this directly in the SOP’s “Purpose and Scope” section.
texts.text: Note: You may include this directly in the SOP’s “Purpose and Scope” section.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Change Criteria – When Does This SOP Apply?
texts.text: Change Criteria – When Does This SOP Apply?

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This table helps determine when a project adjustment requires formal change control. It is used to quickly assess whether an update is significant enough to trigger the SOP.
texts.text: This table helps determine when a project adjustment requires formal change control. It is used to quickly assess whether an update is significant enough to trigger the SOP.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Roles & Stakeholders – RACI Table
texts.text: Roles & Stakeholders – RACI Table

texts.label: text
texts.orig: This matrix is used to define which functions are responsible, accountable, consulted, or informed at each stage of the change control process.
texts.text: This matrix is used to define which functions are responsible, accountable, consulted, or informed at each stage of the change control process.

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Definitions:
texts.text: Definitions:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: R – Responsible: The person/team doing the work
texts.text: R – Responsible: The person/team doing the work

texts.label: text
texts.orig: A – Accountable: The person/team who makes the final decision or approval
texts.text: A – Accountable: The person/team who makes the final decision or approval

texts.label: text
texts.orig: C – Consulted: Stakeholders whose input is required before a decision
texts.text: C – Consulted: Stakeholders whose input is required before a decision

texts.label: text
texts.orig: I – Informed: Stakeholders who are notified after a decision or action
texts.text: I – Informed: Stakeholders who are notified after a decision or action

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 3A. Change Request Form
texts.text: 3A. Change Request Form

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Include a Word or Excel form template with the following fields:
texts.text: Include a Word or Excel form template with the following fields:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 3B. Change Log Tracker (Excel)
texts.text: 3B. Change Log Tracker (Excel)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Include a centralized tracker for logging all change requests. Sample columns:
texts.text: Include a centralized tracker for logging all change requests. Sample columns:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: 3C. Document Management and Ownership
texts.text: 3C. Document Management and Ownership

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Clarify:
texts.text: Clarify:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Where the tracker is stored (e.g., SharePoint, Smartsheet)
texts.text: Where the tracker is stored (e.g., SharePoint, Smartsheet)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Where the signed forms are archived
texts.text: Where the signed forms are archived

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Who owns the maintenance of the log
texts.text: Who owns the maintenance of the log

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Approval Sequence (Logic Flow)
texts.text: Approval Sequence (Logic Flow)

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Base flowchart for medium/high impact changes:
texts.text: Base flowchart for medium/high impact changes:

texts.label: text
texts.orig: PM submits form → QA reviews → Tech Ops reviews → Finance reviews (if budget) → Regulatory reviews (if filing impact) → Final PM Lead signoff → Entry into tracker and archive
texts.text: PM submits form → QA reviews → Tech Ops reviews → Finance reviews (if budget) → Regulatory reviews (if filing impact) → Final PM Lead signoff → Entry into tracker and archive

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Low-risk changes that do not impact timelines, scope, budget, or compliance—such as minor corrections or 1-day adjustments—can be fast-tracked. These require only joint approval from the Project Manager and QA and must still be logged for audit purposes, but do not go through the full review process.
texts.text: Low-risk changes that do not impact timelines, scope, budget, or compliance—such as minor corrections or 1-day adjustments—can be fast-tracked. These require only joint approval from the Project Manager and QA and must still be logged for audit purposes, but do not go through the full review process.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Audit Readiness Expectations
texts.text: Audit Readiness Expectations

texts.label: text
texts.orig: Make this explicit in the SOP:
texts.text: Make this explicit in the SOP:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Every change request must be timestamped
texts.text: Every change request must be timestamped

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Approvals must be recorded in writing (email, signature, electronic log)
texts.text: Approvals must be recorded in writing (email, signature, electronic log)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: All supporting documents should be version controlled
texts.text: All supporting documents should be version controlled

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The final status of the change must be logged and traceable
texts.text: The final status of the change must be logged and traceable

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The tracker must be reviewable by internal QA or external auditors for compliance
texts.text: The tracker must be reviewable by internal QA or external auditors for compliance

Drafting supporting docs not included in filing
